descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee471/edwardvlad/np_enhanced.jpg[/img]

Updates:
v0.2.1=fixed textures path problem.
[b]Installation[/b]:
Copy the Data folder to your \"C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\" folder.

[b]Mod details[/b]:
This mod enhance the Nordplate armor by adding pauldrons, more armor on legs, chainmail etc.

Only male version for now, I\'ll make female one when I want to (yeah I know I say it every time but... you know... that\'s the life)

[b]IMPORTANT[/b] I\'m also looking for someone good in modelling. So please if you are contact me.
author: edwardvlad
